decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (001, 003, 005 and Location Plan (Received 12/02/2015). 004 Rev A (Received 09/03/2015). Proposed Elevations 003 (Received 31/03/2015)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - The waste and recycled materials storage arrangements shown on the approved drawing shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
Condition : 3 - The extension hereby permitted shall be clad on all sides with brick slips which match the rear elevation of the original building within 3 months of this decision being issued.
description: Retrospective application for erection of a new single storey rear extension to the shop
